{"title":"Section 2, Page 23","subjec":{},"descri":{},"creato":{},"publis":{},"date":{},"year":{},"format":{},"reposi":{},"collec":{},"reposa":{},"rights":{},"digitb":{},"langua":{},"topics":{},"cite":{},"notes":{},"notesa":{},"source":{},"box":{},"folder":{},"identi":{},"relati":{},"findin":{},"catalo":{},"type":{},"full":"23
and its products arc estimated at one hundred millions of dollars. This change has taken place within my time, within
1 all' a century ; and all this, fellow citizens, has been achieved
hi American enterprise, by American industry, under this
great and glorious Union. Who would not be proud to be
one of its citizens?
In conclusion, fellow citizens, I have only to say that, the
only thing that should be required to induce you to embark
in this tri-eat work of internal improvement, will be the assurance that the necessary capital will be furnished, and that
the work will be carried out in good faith. It would be a
proud day for me to see it finished. I may contribute towards the building, but my age precludes the hope that I can
realize much benefit from it.
I thank you for your kind attention and marks of appro-
dation to those desultory remarks.
Judge Moore took his scat amid loud applause.
Governor Mouton, being loudly called for, was
determined not to tire the patience of the Convention by a long speech.
He liked the way things had thus far been conducted. It augured well for the contemplated project. Speeches will not make railroads, and as to
acts, we, of the country, are in earnest. Our people
believe in the feasibility of the contemplated road,
they believe that the business which would spring
up, would be amply sufficient to furnish it an ade-
qnate support, and so believing, they are willing to
contribute their full quota of the funds required for
its construction. Full of this faith and these assurances, they say, tax us ! Tax us, because we are
sure that the result will be to our advantage. Tax
us, because we are willing to hazard something","fullrs":{},"find":"2088.jp2","dmaccess":{},"dmimage":{},"dmcreated":"2012-01-18","dmmodified":"2012-01-18","dmoclcno":{},"dmrecord":"2087","restrictionCode":"1","cdmfilesize":"512368","cdmfilesizeformatted":"0.49 MB","cdmprintpdf":"0","cdmhasocr":"1","cdmisnewspaper":"0"}
